name: Tomorrow Rising
description:
Tomorrow Rising - This is a test engine i have been having fun with. This HTML version has been rounded off to make a little "Run And Gun" fun and detect any bugs. Please Note: This is a very basic core of a game to come. 

I'm already working on a full featured version with player progress and upgrades and even expanding on the level generation system. I have many idea's to expand this game and even break away from " infinite runner " genre, but i will see when i get there.

Sound is not broken ! 
-Sound will be added to full version

Thanks for checking out my project.

As always - Love Scilized
